form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Rounds (for himself and Mrs. Gillibrand) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To amend section 1030 of title 18, United States Code, to include conspiracy in the offenses and penalties relating to computer fraud.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Cyber Conspiracy Modernization Act.

section.header: Penalties for conspiracies to violate section 1030
section.text: Section 1030(c) of title 18, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: by inserting or a conspiracy after an attempt each place it appears; and

subparagraph.text: in subparagraph (A)(i), in the matter preceding subclause (I), by striking attempted and inserting attempt or a conspiracy to commit an;
in subparagraph (B)(i), by striking attempted and inserting attempt or a conspiracy to commit an;
in subparagraph (E), by inserting , conspires to cause, after attempts to cause; and
in subparagraph (F), by inserting , conspires to cause, after attempts to cause.
